alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Oklahoma; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 4:27AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Oklahoma, northeastern Cleveland and northwestern Pottawatomie Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 426 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Newalla to southeast Oklahoma City east of Lake Draper. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Oklahoma City, northeastern Norman, Tecumseh, Choctaw, McLoud, Pink, Brooksville, Stella, Dale, Stanley Draper Lake, Newalla, Lake Thunderbird, Bethel Acres and Little Axe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
